description: Guild Wars 2 is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by ArenaNet and published by NCSOFT

blocks.name: getAccountInfo
blocks.description: This resource returns information about player accounts.

blocks.name: getMyAchivements
blocks.description: This resource returns an account's progress towards all their achievements.

blocks.name: getVault
blocks.description: This resource returns the items stored in a player's vault (not including material storage).

blocks.name: getDungeons
blocks.description: This endpoints returns an array of strings representing dungeon path names completed since daily dungeon reset.

blocks.name: getDyes
blocks.description: This resource returns the unlocked dyes of the account.

blocks.name: getFinishers
blocks.description: This resource returns information about finishers that are unlocked for an account.

blocks.name: getGliders
blocks.description: This resource returns information about gliders that are unlocked for an account.

blocks.name: getCats
blocks.description: This endpoints returns an array of objects with the following: id (number) - The id for the cat. hint (string) (optional) - A hint to identify what is needed for each cat.

blocks.name: getNodes
blocks.description: This endpoint returns an array of strings. Each string represents the name of a particular node.

blocks.name: getInventory
blocks.description: This resource returns the shared inventory slots in an account.

blocks.name: getMailcarriers
blocks.description: This resource returns information about mail carriers that are unlocked for an account.

blocks.name: getMasteries
blocks.description: This resource returns information about masteries that are unlocked for an account

blocks.name: getMasteryPoints
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the total amount of masteries that are unlocked for an account.

blocks.name: getMaterials
blocks.description: This resource returns the materials stored in a player's vault.

blocks.name: getMiniatures
blocks.description: This resource returns the unlocked miniatures of the account.

blocks.name: getOutfits
blocks.description: This resource returns information about outfits that are unlocked for an account.

blocks.name: getPVPHeroes
blocks.description: This resource returns information about pvp heroes that are unlocked for an account.

blocks.name: getRais
blocks.description: This endpoints returns an array of strings representing raid encounters completed since weekly raid reset.

blocks.name: getRecipes
blocks.description: This resource returns information about recipes that are unlocked for an account.

blocks.name: getSkins
blocks.description: This resource returns the unlocked skins of the account.

blocks.name: getTitles
blocks.description: This resource returns information about titles that are unlocked for an account.

blocks.name: getWallet
blocks.description: This resource returns the currencies of the account.

blocks.name: getAchivements
blocks.description: This resource returns all achievements in the game, including localized names and icons.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getAchivementsCategories
blocks.description: This resource returns all the categories for achievements.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getDailyAchiements
blocks.description: This resource returns the current set of daily achievements.

blocks.name: getTomorrowAchievements
blocks.description: This resource returns the next set of daily achievements.

blocks.name: getAchivementsGroups
blocks.description: This resource returns all the top-level groups for achievements.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getAnswers
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the Biography answers that are in the game.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getQuestions
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the Biography questions that are in the game.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getBuild
blocks.description: This resource returns the current build id of the game. This can be used, for example, to register when event timers reset due to server restarts.

blocks.name: listCats
blocks.description: List of cats in the gamge

blocks.name: getCharacters
blocks.description: This resource returns information about characters attached to a specific account.

blocks.name: getSingleCharacter
blocks.description: This resource returns information about character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterHeropoints
blocks.description: This resource returns information about heropoints of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterBackstory
blocks.description: This resource returns information about backstory of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterCore
blocks.description: This resource returns information about core of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterCrafting
blocks.description: This resource returns information about crafting of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterEquipment
blocks.description: This resource returns information about equipment of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterInventory
blocks.description: This resource returns information about inventory of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterRecipes
blocks.description: This resource returns information about recipes of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterSab
blocks.description: This resource returns information about sab of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterSkills
blocks.description: This resource returns information about skills of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterSpecializations
blocks.description: This resource returns information about specializations of the character by its id

blocks.name: getCharacterTraining
blocks.description: This resource returns information about training of the character by its id

blocks.name: getColors
blocks.description: This resource returns all dye colors in the game, including localized names and their color component information.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getCommerce
blocks.description: This resource provides access to the current items and coins available for pickup on this account

blocks.name: getCoinsExchange
blocks.description: This resource returns the current coins to gems exchange rate.

args.name: quantity
args.info: The amount of coins to exchange for gems.

blocks.name: getGemsExchange
blocks.description: This resource returns the current gem to coins exchange rate.

args.name: quantity
args.info: The amount of gems to exchange for coins.

blocks.name: getCommerceListings
blocks.description: This resource returns current buy and sell listings from the trading post.

blocks.name: getCommercePrices
blocks.description: This resource returns current aggregated buy and sell listing information from the trading post.

blocks.name: getCommerceTransactions
blocks.description: This resource provides access to the current and historical transactions of a player. This is an authenticated endpoint. Results are cached for five minutes.[1]

blocks.name: getContinents
blocks.description: This resource returns static information about the continents

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getContinentFloors
blocks.description: This resource returns static information about the continent's floors

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getFloorRegions
blocks.description: This resource returns static information about the floor's regions

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getRegionMaps
blocks.description: This resource returns static information about the region's maps

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getMapSectors
blocks.description: This resource returns static information about the map's sectors

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getMapPois
blocks.description: This resource returns static information about the map's pois

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getMapTasks
blocks.description: This resource returns static information about the map's tasks

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getCurrencies
blocks.description: This resource returns a list of the currencies contained in the account wallet.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: listDungeons
blocks.description: This resource returns details about each dungeon and it's associated paths.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getEmblems
blocks.description: This resource returns image resources that are needed to render guild emblems.

blocks.name: getFiles
blocks.description: This resource returns commonly requested in-game assets that may be used to enhance API-derived applications.

blocks.name: listFinishers
blocks.description: This resource returns information about finishers that are available in-game.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: listGliders
blocks.description: This resource returns information about gliders that are available in-game.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getSingleGuild
blocks.description: This resource returns core details about a given guild.

blocks.name: getGuildLog
blocks.description: This resource returns information about certain events in a guild's log.

args.name: since
args.info: This will filter out all log entries not newer than the id given.

blocks.name: getGuildMembers
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the members of a specified guild.

blocks.name: getGuildRanks
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the ranks of a specified guild.

blocks.name: getGuildStash
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the items in a guild's vault.

blocks.name: getGuildTeams
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the teams in a guild.

blocks.name: getGuildTreasury
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the items in a guild's treasury.

blocks.name: getGuildUpgrades
blocks.description: This resource returns information about the guild's upgrades.

blocks.name: listGuildPermissions
blocks.description: This resource returns information about all guild permissions.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: searchGuild
blocks.description: This resource returns information on guild ids to be used for other API queries.

args.name: name
args.info: The guild name must be given in order to obtain the relevant id.

blocks.name: listGuildUpgrades
blocks.description: This resource returns information about all available Guild Hall upgrades, including scribe decorations.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: listNodes
blocks.description: This endpoints returns an array of ids for all currently available home instance nodes.

blocks.description: This resource returns information about node by its id

blocks.description: This resource returns information about the outfits that are in the game.

blocks.name: listPVP

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: listPVPSeasons
blocks.description: This resource returns information about League seasons.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getPVPSeasonLeaderboard
blocks.description: This resource returns information about League seasons.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

args.name: endpoint
args.info: For the season ids of season 1-4, there will be an option to examine the legendary or guild endpoints. The guild endpoint will return the guild leaderboard, whereas the legendary will return the solo leaderboard. For the season id of season 5, the endpoints legendary or guild are not available, replaced instead with ladder.

blocks.name: getPVPStandings
blocks.description: This resource returns information about player pips.

blocks.name: getPVPStats
blocks.description: This resource returns information about wins and losses in the account's PvP matches.

blocks.name: listQuaggans
blocks.description: This resource returns quaggan images.

blocks.name: getSingleQuaggan
blocks.description: This resource returns information about quaggan by its id

blocks.name: listRaces
blocks.description: Requests an array of strings containing the name of all playable races.

blocks.name: getSingleRaceSkills
blocks.description: Request the racial skills ids for the specific race.

blocks.name: listRecipes
blocks.description: This resource returns information about recipes that were discovered by players in the game.

args.info: The item id when searching for recipes with an item as an ingredient.

blocks.name: searchRecipeByCraft
blocks.description: This resource allows searching for recipe.

args.name: itemId
args.info: The item id when searching for the recipes that craft an item.

args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: listWVWAbilities

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: listWVWMatches
blocks.description: This resource returns further details about the specified matches, including the total score, kills and deaths, and further details for each map.

args.name: worldId
args.info: The ID of one of the worlds participating in the match.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getWVWMatchesOverview
blocks.description: This resource lists the world ids for each matches along with the start and end times.

args.name: worldId
args.info: The ID of one of the worlds participating in the match.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getWVWMatchesScore
blocks.description: This resource return a detailed object of scores per map along with the overall score

args.name: worldId
args.info: The ID of one of the worlds participating in the match.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

blocks.name: getWVWMatchesStats
blocks.description: This resource return information on map specific, and overall, kills and deaths.

args.name: worldId
args.info: The ID of one of the worlds participating in the match.

args.name: language
args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

args.info: Valid languages are en, es, de, fr, ko and zh. If no language parameter is set, the language defaults to en.

args.name: language
